abstract.text: Loads the player’s friends list, scoped by the identifiers, if the player and their friends grant access.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The game player IDs and team player IDs that GameKit uses to scope the friends that it passes to the completion handler.
The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.
The block receives the following parameters:
The player’s friends who also grant your game access to their friends and whose
or
property appears in the
parameter.
The local player and their friends’ authorization status must be
The local player and their friends must use a version of the game with the same bundle ID.
Describes an error if it occurs, or
if the operation completes.
If the
method returns
, GameKit presents a prompt to the local player requesting access to the friends that may pause your game. GameKit displays the localized reason that you provide for the
key in the information property list.
If you loaded friends who no longer appear in the
parameter of the completion handler, remove the data for those friends from your game because they no longer grant your game access to that data.

abstract.text: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to their Game Center friends list.
Enable players to interact with friends, compare leaderboard ranks, earn achievements, and participate in multiplayer games.
Constants that indicate if the local player grants access to their friends list.
The player authorized your game to access their list of friends.
The player hasn’t choosen whether your game may access their friends list.
The local player who signs in to Game Center on the device running the game.
Loads players to whom the local player can issue a challenge.
Loads the local player’s friends list if the local player and their friends grant access.
Loads the player’s friends list, scoped by the identifiers, if the player and their friends grant access.
Returns whether the player authorizes your game to access their friends list.
Loads players from the friends list or players that recently participated in a game with the local player.
A remote player who the local player running your game can invite and communicate with through Game Center.
A unique identifier for a player of the game.
A unique identifier for a player of all the games that you distribute using your developer account.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
